about_me.des: I am a full stack developer that loves to make life easier for other developers. I experiment with emerging software technologies and development practices. Java is my natual language and I can do and undo with java. I absolutely love working with spring framework, spingboot and springcloud. In the front end, AngularJs is my thing, but I also dabnle in others like meteorjs, jquery, reactjs and so on. Learning programming languages is easy to pick up - I should know, I am also familiar with c++, C# and python. I believe that with the power of progamming, your abilities is limited only to your imagination!

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.issl_desc: Now I am in ISSLNG, where I develop mobile and web applications for clients.
